import React, { useState } from 'react' import LatestTv from './Latest/LatestTv' import LatestMovie from './Latest/LatestMovie' export default function LatestMovieTv() { const [activeButton, setActiveButton] = useState('Movies') const buttonStyle = 'rounded bg-[#1a212d] ml-2 my-2 px-2 text-center text-[#605f62] h-[30px] font-light text-[12px]' const buttonStyle1 = 'rounded bg-[#ffae06] text-white ml-2 my-2 px-2 text-center h-[30px] font-light text-[12px]' // const {isLoading:LoadingLatestMovie, isError:LatestError, data:Latest} = FetchLatestQuery() const handleButton = (ButtonName:any)=>{ setActiveButton(ButtonName) } return ( <>

LATEST

{/* { Latest && Latest.map((latestmovie:any)=>(

HD

{latestmovie.title || latestmovie.name}

{latestmovie.popularity } { latestmovie.vote_count }

year
)) */} {/* } */}
) }
